alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 9:36PM CDT until April 06 at 12:31PM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river and location in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Riverton. .Lowland flooding from excessive rainfall remains on the Wabash River at Riverton in southwestern Indiana as of Tuesday evening. This flooding is expected to end by noon Wednesday. This will bring flooding to an end in the National Weather Service Indianapolis service area. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Some agricultural lands underwater. A few rural roads in Crawford County, Illinois close as water backs up Minnow Slough. High water affects campground at Leaverton Park in Palestine. A few private roads near the Gill Township levee in Sullivan County may flood. Water level is at the top of most makeshift levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday /10:00 PM EDT Tuesday/ the stage was 15.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday /10:00 PM EDT Tuesday/ was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 7.6 feet Friday, April 15. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
